featured.name: Lotek
featured.body: Our specialty since 1953. Beansprouts, Cabbage, Water Spinach, blended with peanut sauce, with a hint of aromatic ginger (kencur). Comes with non-spicy | medium | extra spicy options.

list.name: Nasi Rames
list.body: Tender slow cooked beef with rendang paste, vegetables, egg, cucumber. Served with warm rice and Kerupuk.

list.name: Nasi Kari Ayam / Kari Daging
list.body: Shredded chicken or beef rendang, potato, egg, in savory yellow curry. Served with warm rice and Kerupuk.

list.name: Nasi Ayam Goreng Sambal Khas
list.body: Free-range chicken (Ayam Kampong), shallow fried until tender with crispy skin. Served with warm rice, our special sambal recipe, tempe, and cucumber.

list.name: Laksa Ayam
list.body: Shredded chicken, vermicelli, beansprouts, egg, in savory curry soup. Served with acar timun and Kerupuk.

list.name: Nasi Bakar
list.body: Rice, Mackerel, Basil leaves, Petai wrapped in banana leaves and roasted.

list.name: Pepes Peda
list.body: Mackerel, Cassava leaves, Petai wrapped in banana leaves and roasted. A bit spicy.

list.name: Rendang Jengkol
list.body: Slow cooked Jengkol and homemade Rendang sauce, a bit spicy.

list.name: Rendang Sengkel
list.body: Slow cooked Beef Tendon and homemade Rendang sauce.

list.name: Tumis Daun Pepaya
list.body: Fresh Papaya leaves and Petai, sautéed.

body.options: Aci Terasi, Aci Kuning, Aci Putih, Kerupuk Bawang, Kerupuk Udang, Reginang, Emping Manis, Gendar, Peyek
Combro, Bakwan, Perkedel Jagung, Tempe, Tahu

featured.name: Various Kolak
featured.body: Mix and match our sweet desserts, with homemade coconut puree.
featured.ingredients: Bubur Sagurangi, Bubur Jali, Caca, Pacar, Kolak Pisang, Bubur Ketan Hitam, Bubur Kacang Hijau, Candil

list.name: Rujak Beubeuk
list.body: Jícama (Bengkuang), Ambarella (Kedondong), Sour Mango, and Sweet Potato. Pestled and poured with sweet zesty palm sugar sauce.

list.name: Juices
list.ingredients: Ambarella (Kedondong), Mango, Lime, Guava, Tomato, Orange

body.options: Black tea, Lemon tea, Happy Soda, Chocolate, Cappuccino, Coffee, Mineral water
